ISSUE.TITLE: Generate customer invoices in customer language (configurable)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When exporting invoices in admin interface, invoices are currently generated in the language that is selected in the admin interface. They should be generated in the language of the customer. Can this be fixed? Locale resources, product names, etc P.S. Let's make it configurable We have "PrintOrderToPdf" method in the \Libraries\Nop.Services\Common\PdfService.cs file. It has "languageId" parameter. So what you have to do is to pass 0 for this parameter in all method invocations (in OrderController)
